00002 #include <string.h>
00003 #include <stdlib.h>
00004 #include "base.h"
00005 #include "file.h"
00006 #include "html.h"
00007 #include "io.h"
00008 #include "menu.h"
00009 #include "pk.h"
00010 
00011 #define DBFILE   "base01.dat"   /* The database file name. */
00012 #define HTMLFILE "lista.html"   /* The HTML output. */
00013 #define PKFILE   "pkfile.pk"    /* The primary key file name. */
00014 
00015 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00016   FILE *base;                 /* base01.dat basically */
00017   FILE *htmlfile;             /* Every single report will be printed here */
00018   FILE *pkfile;               /* File with the primary key table. */
00019 
00020   artwork_info info;          /* Holds the artwork data. */
00021   PrimaryKeyList* pkindex;
00022 
00023   char c;                     /* Holds the user's choice from the menus. */
00024   int insert_data;            /* Whether or not to insert more data into the dat file. */
00025   char name[TITLE_LENGTH+1];  /* Holds the name for which to search. */
00026   int i;                      /* Number of entries in our database. */
00027   int match_pos;              /* Will hold the rrn of the found register. */
00028 
00029   /* Try to open it for reading. */
00030   base = fopen(DBFILE, "r");
00031   if (!base) {
00032     printf("Base de dados ainda nao existe.\n");
00033   }
00034 
00035   pkindex = pkListInit();
00036   if (pkindex == NULL) {
00037     printf("Erro ao carregar chaves primarias. Saindo.\n");
00038     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00039   }
00040 
00041   /* Loading the primary key tables. */
00042   printf("Carregando tabela de chaves primarias...\n");
00043   if (fileExists(PKFILE) && fileExists(DBFILE)) {
00044     pkfile = fopen(PKFILE, "r");
00045     pkListLoadFromPK(pkindex, pkfile);
00046     fclose(pkfile);
00047   }
00048   else if (fileExists(DBFILE)){
00049     printf("A tabela de chaves primarias esta sendo criada.\n");
00050     pkListLoadFromBase(pkindex, base);
00051   }
00052 
00053   /* If there was a database, we now close it. */
00054   if (base)
00055     fclose(base);
00056 
00057   /* And now we can open it for appending so we can insert new registers. */
00058   base = fopen(DBFILE, "a+");
00059   if (!base) {
00060     printf("Erro ao criar base de dados. Saindo...\n");
00061     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00062   }
00063 
00064   printWelcome();
00065 
00066   while (1) {
00067     printMenu();
00068 
00069     if (readChar(&c)) {
00070       printf("\nErro: Opcao invalida.\n");
00071       continue;
00072     }
00073 
00074     switch (tolower(c)) {
00075     default:
00076       printf("\n(%c): Opcao invalida.\n", c);
00077       break;
00078 
00079     case 'i':
00080       insert_data = 1;
00081 
00082       while (insert_data) {
00083         readData(&info);
00084 
00085         if (pkListFindByName(pkindex, info.title) != -1) {
00086           printf("\nJa existe uma obra com titulo \"%s\".\n", info.title);
00087           continue;
00088         }
00089 
00090         baseWriteData(base, &info);
00091         pkListInsert(pkindex, info.title);
00092 
00093         while (1) {
00094           printf("\nDeseja inserir mais uma entrada? (s)im, (n)ao? ");
00095 
00096           if (readChar(&c) == -1)
00097             printf("\nOpcao invalida");
00098 
00099           c = tolower(c);
00100 
00101           if (c == 's')
00102             break;
00103           else if (c == 'n') {
00104             insert_data = 0;
00105             break;
00106           }
00107           else
00108             printf("\nOpcao invalida");
00109         }
00110       }
00111 
00112       break;
00113 
00114     case 'c':
00115       readString("\n    Por favor, digite o titulo da obra (Max: 200 caracteres): ",
00116                  name, TITLE_LENGTH);
00117 
00118       /* Getting the rrn of the search. */
00119       match_pos = pkListFindByName(pkindex, name);
00120 
00121       if (match_pos == -1)
00122         printf("\n    Nao foi encontrada nenhuma obra com titulo \"%s\".\n", name);
00123       else {
00124         htmlfile = fopen(HTMLFILE, "w");
00125         htmlBegin(htmlfile);
00126 
00127         /* Go to the database position of the found rrn. */
00128         fseek(base, match_pos*REG_SIZE, SEEK_SET);
00129         /* And then read that register. */
00130         baseReadArtworkRecord(base, &info);
00131         /* So we can write it to the html file. */
00132         htmlWriteRecordInfo(htmlfile, &info);
00133 
00134         htmlEnd(htmlfile);
00135         fclose(htmlfile);
00136 
00137         printf("\n    As informacoes da obra \"%s\" foram salvas em \"%s\".\n", name, HTMLFILE);
00138       }
00139 
00140       break;
00141 
00142     case 'g':
00143       printf("   Gerando lista de obras...\n");
00144 
00145       if (pkListIsEmpty(pkindex)) {
00146         printf("     O catalogo ainda nao possui obras.\n");
00147       }
00148       else {
00149         htmlfile = fopen(HTMLFILE, "w");
00150         htmlBegin(htmlfile);
00151 
00152         fseek(base, 0, SEEK_SET);
00153 
00154         /* For each pk in the index, start from the beggining since it's sorted. */
00155         for (i = 0; i < pkindex->regnum; i++) {
00156           /* Seek it into the database. */
00157           fseek(base, (pkindex->pklist[i].rrn) * REG_SIZE, SEEK_SET);
00158           /* Read it's contents. */
00159           baseReadArtworkRecord(base, &info);
00160           /* And write it to the html file. */
00161           htmlWriteRecordInfo(htmlfile, &info);
00162         }
00163 
00164         htmlEnd(htmlfile);
00165         fclose(htmlfile);
00166 
00167         printf("   Lista \"%s\" gerada com sucesso.\n", HTMLFILE);
00168       }
00169 
00170       break;
00171 
00172     case 's':
00173       printf("Salvando tabela de chaves de busca...\n");
00174 
00175       /* We always rewrite the pkfile since it must be sorted. */
00176       pkfile = fopen(PKFILE, "w");
00177       pkListWriteToFile(pkindex, pkfile);
00178       fclose(pkfile);
00179 
00180       /* Free the alocated memory for the PK index. */
00181       pkListFree(pkindex);
00182       fclose(base);
00183 
00184       printf("Saindo...\n");
00185       return 0;
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   return 0;
00190 }
